Soma

  11100
+ 01001
----------
  100101=37

  0011001
+ 0111001
----------
1010010=82

  100011
+ 100010
--------
1000101=69

  1010
+ 1000
+ 1001
----------
11011=27


Multiplicação

  101
x  11
  101
------
 101
 1111=15 

  1010
 x 101
---------
  1010
 0000
1010
110010= 50

x    1001

    11010
   00000

 11101010 = 234
